list.title: convertArrToReadableString
list.description:
Takes in an integer array and returns a string of integers separated by
		commas with an 'and' after final comma

list.title: createFortuneOnTicket
list.description: Replaces text on card in DOM with new fortune and new list of lucky numbers.

list.title: flipTicket
list.description: Starting from image face of ticket, flip

list.title: isTicketCurrentlyDisplayed
list.description: Gets whether or not fortune card is currently on screen

list.title: isTicketCurrentlyFlipped
list.description: Gets whether or not fortune card is currently displaying rear face

list.title: placeRandomNumbers
list.description: Place list of random numbers into the DOM

list.title: playBackgroundNoise
list.description: Starts background noise, fading in over 5 seconds

list.title: produceFortune
list.description: Generates a random fortune from JSON file

list.title: produceRandomNumbers
list.description:
Generates an array of n distinct integers spaced between low and high.
Gives back an empty array if no input n, or if there aren't enough numbers
		between high and low to fill the array

list.title: tellPageLoaded
list.description:
Adds event listeners to trigger dismissal of splash screen
and enabling of controls on any user input (key/mouse)

list.title: toggleTicketOn
list.description: Slides ticket up from bottom of screen
